segments.text: Hi , Doris . You look a little bit down . What's the matter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm leaving Japan and I'm going back to London , tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you feel about that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I do feel quite down because I am going to miss Japan after being here for 9 months , in Japan . I am going to miss it so much , cause I've had a great time here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mm , so what are you going to miss about Japan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I am going to miss the people , the food , the night life . Especially the nightlife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What especially about the night life are you going to miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I really like dancing . And I enjoy going out to night clubs and to restaurants and eating Japanese food also and I'm really going to miss that because it's very different to London .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How are the clubs different in Japan than in London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , here there are many different clubs you can get into , for free , you don't have to pay , some of them . In London it's really expensive for drinks and an entry fee .
segments.speaker: S2
